headline: Exxon Mobil Corporation (XOM): Among the Best Beginner Stocks
summary: We recently published a list of Starter Stock Portfolio 12 Safe Stocks to Buy. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Exxon Mobil Corporation (NYSE:XOM) stands against other best beginner stocks. The US stock market has experienced a turbulent first quarter of 2025, marked by increased volatility and negative returns […]

headline: ExxonMobil Expects to Report a Profit Gusher in Q1. Can It Repeat That Feat With Crude Prices Falling?
summary: ExxonMobil (NYSE: XOM) recently gave investors a glimpse into its upcoming first-quarter earnings report.  A combination of higher oil and natural gas prices and improving oil refining margins helped fuel the increased profitability.  Crude prices have crumbled due to concerns about how higher tariffs will impact the global economy.
